available_attributes.name: Patient
available_attributes.description: The person receiving care via the platform

available_attributes.name: Clinician
available_attributes.description: Doctor, specialist, or nurse providing care

available_attributes.name: Care Coordinator
available_attributes.description: Team member coordinating appointments and follow-ups

available_attributes.name: Telehealth App
available_attributes.description: Mobile or desktop application used for virtual care

available_attributes.name: Patient Portal
available_attributes.description: Web portal where patients manage their profile and records

available_attributes.name: EHR System
available_attributes.description: Electronic Health Record system storing clinical data

available_attributes.name: Insurance Provider
available_attributes.description: Third-party payer responsible for coverage and claims

available_attributes.name: Insurance Policy
available_attributes.description: Policy details including coverage, deductibles, and copays

available_attributes.name: Appointment
available_attributes.description: A scheduled consultation between patient and clinician

available_attributes.name: Notification Service
available_attributes.description: Service responsible for sending reminders and alerts

available_attributes.name: Pharmacy
available_attributes.description: Pharmacy fulfilling prescriptions

available_attributes.name: Prescription
available_attributes.description: Medication prescribed during or after consultation

available_attributes.name: Diagnostic Lab
available_attributes.description: Laboratory performing tests ordered by the clinician

available_attributes.name: Test Order
available_attributes.description: Order for diagnostic tests such as blood work or imaging

available_attributes.name: Video Call
available_attributes.description: Live video communication channel for virtual visits

available_attributes.name: Email
available_attributes.description: Email channel used for confirmations and summaries

available_attributes.name: Push Notification
available_attributes.description: Mobile or desktop push alerts

available_attributes.name: Clinic Location
available_attributes.description: Physical clinic used for in-person visits when required

available_attributes.name: Payment Transaction
available_attributes.description: The act of paying for a consultation or service

available_attributes.name: Care Plan
available_attributes.description: Structured plan outlining ongoing treatment and follow-up

journeys.name: Registration & Account Setup Journey
journeys.description: Journey from first arrival on the platform to a fully verified and configured patient account.
journeys.summary: Phase 1 of the patient lifecycle: onboarding, verification, and profile configuration.

steps.name: Visit Landing Page
steps.description: I arrive on the digital health platform landing page from a search ad.

steps.name: Explore Benefits
steps.description: I browse information about virtual care, pricing, and clinician types.

steps.name: Create Account
steps.description: I start the sign-up flow to create my patient account.

subjourney.name: Account Creation Flow
subjourney.description: Detailed journey through account creation steps.
subjourney.summary: Subjourney covering personal details, credentials, and email verification.

steps.name: Enter Basic Information
steps.description: I enter my name, date of birth, and contact details.

steps.name: Create Login Credentials
steps.description: I choose my username and password and accept terms.

steps.name: Receive Verification Email
steps.description: I receive an email to verify my account.

subjourney.name: Email Verification Edge Cases
subjourney.description: Handling different scenarios when verifying email.
subjourney.summary: Nested subjourney with resend, spam check, and link expiry handling.

steps.name: Find Email in Inbox
steps.description: I locate the verification email in my inbox.

steps.name: Resend Verification
steps.description: I request a new verification email if I cannot find the first one.

steps.name: Click Verification Link
steps.description: I click the verification link to confirm my email.

steps.name: Handle Expired Link
steps.description: If the link is expired, I am guided to request a new one.

steps.name: Complete Health Profile
steps.description: I enter medical history, allergies, and medications.

steps.name: Add Insurance Details
steps.description: I add my insurance provider and policy details to my account.

journeys.name: Appointment Booking & Preparation Journey
journeys.description: Journey from searching for a suitable clinician to being fully prepared for the appointment.
journeys.summary: Phase 2 of the patient lifecycle: finding the right clinician, booking, and preparing for the visit.

steps.name: Search for Clinicians
steps.description: I search by specialty, availability, and language preferences.

subjourney.name: Provider Search & Matching
subjourney.description: Detailed subjourney for finding a clinician that meets clinical and personal preferences.
subjourney.summary: Subjourney for filters, recommendations, and insurance compatibility.

steps.name: Set Search Filters
steps.description: I set filters such as specialty, gender preference, and language.

steps.name: View Recommended Clinicians
steps.description: I browse recommended clinicians based on my preferences.

steps.name: Check Insurance Coverage
steps.description: I see whether each clinician is covered under my insurance.

subjourney.name: Eligibility Verification Process
subjourney.description: Nested subjourney verifying coverage, copay, and preauthorization requirements.
subjourney.summary: Nested subjourney for real-time insurance eligibility checks.

steps.name: Send Eligibility Request
steps.description: The platform sends an eligibility request to the insurance provider.

steps.name: Receive Eligibility Response
steps.description: The platform receives coverage details and displays estimated out-of-pocket costs.

steps.name: Request Preauthorization
steps.description: The system initiates a preauthorization request if required.

steps.name: Notify Patient of Status
steps.description: I receive updates when preauthorization is approved or denied.

steps.name: Select Clinician
steps.description: I choose a clinician from the filtered results.

steps.name: Choose Time Slot
steps.description: I pick a time slot that works for both me and the clinician.

steps.name: Confirm Appointment
steps.description: I confirm the appointment and see the booking summary.

subjourney.name: Booking Confirmation & Reminders
subjourney.description: Subjourney covering confirmation messages and reminder notifications.
subjourney.summary: Subjourney for confirmation, calendar, and reminder touchpoints.

steps.name: Receive Confirmation Email
steps.description: I receive an email with appointment details and instructions.

steps.name: Receive Push Reminder
steps.description: I receive a reminder notification on my phone before the visit.

steps.name: Complete Pre-Visit Forms
steps.description: I fill out any required questionnaires or consent forms before the visit.

steps.name: Test Video Connection
steps.description: I test my camera, microphone, and connection using the app.

journeys.name: Consultation, Follow-Up & Ongoing Care Journey
journeys.description: Journey from joining the virtual consultation to long-term care plan management.
journeys.summary: Phase 3 of the patient lifecycle: consultation, prescriptions, tests, and ongoing care.

steps.name: Join Virtual Visit
steps.description: I join the scheduled video appointment with my clinician.

subjourney.name: In-Call Experience
subjourney.description: Subjourney covering clinical assessment, documentation, and bedside manner.
subjourney.summary: Subjourney focused on the flow of the virtual consultation.

steps.name: Describe Symptoms
steps.description: I share my symptoms and concerns with the clinician.

steps.name: Clinician Documents Notes
steps.description: The clinician documents notes directly into the EHR system.

steps.name: Agree Care Plan
steps.description: We align on a care plan that may include medication and tests.

subjourney.name: Care Plan Authoring Flow
subjourney.description: Nested subjourney for defining goals, tasks, and follow-up schedule.
subjourney.summary: Nested subjourney covering care plan structure and patient understanding.

steps.name: Capture Clinical Goals
steps.description: The clinician defines measurable clinical goals.

steps.name: Propose Follow-Up Visits
steps.description: The clinician proposes follow-up appointment cadence.

steps.name: Receive Prescription
steps.description: I receive a digital prescription from the clinician.

subjourney.name: Prescription Fulfillment Flow
subjourney.description: Subjourney from prescription issuance to medication pickup or delivery.
subjourney.summary: Subjourney tracking prescription routing and pickup.

steps.name: Send Prescription to Pharmacy
steps.description: The platform routes the prescription to my preferred pharmacy.

steps.name: Receive Ready Notification
steps.description: I get notified that my medication is ready for pickup or out for delivery.

steps.name: Complete Lab Tests
steps.description: I visit a diagnostic lab to complete any ordered tests.

steps.name: View Test Results
steps.description: I receive and review my test results in the portal.

steps.name: Complete Payment
steps.description: I pay any outstanding balance related to my visit.

steps.name: Track Long-Term Care Plan
steps.description: I track my care plan tasks, follow-ups, and goals over time.
